title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 298.7 - Nonutilized donable property
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 298.7 - Nonutilized donable property

State Regulations
(a) All
property in the possession of the SASP which cannot be utilized by eligible
donees shall be reported by the SASP to the GSA for disposal authorization in
accordance with 102-37.290-320. In accordance with this regulation, the SASP, through GSA, shall: (1)
transfer the property
to another State or Federal agency; (2)
sell the property by public
sale; (3)
abandon or destroy the
property; or
(4)
effect disposal by
other means as prescribed by GSA. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
298.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
